name: Usurper\'s Retribution
short_description: Usurper\'s Retribution is a MOD-able 2D RPG game written in C# for the Mono and .NET CLIs using SDL.  It loads its game world from XML files, and offers internationalization features.  It places you in the usurped world of Mobius as a Freedom Fighter.
